price: Ukiwang'oa watu kama vigogo vya mitende vilio ng'olewa.
arabic: تَنزِعُ ٱلنَّاسَ كَأَنَّهُمۡ أَعۡجَازُ نَخۡلٖ مُّنقَعِرٖ
footnotes: Ukiwang'oa watu na kuwatupa nao wamekufa, kama vinavyo ng'olewa vigogo vya mitende na mizizi yake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: tanziʿu al-nāsa ka-annahum aʿjāzu nakhlin munqaʿirin
